author: ate
msg: JS2-1263: Hardening j2-admin security by restricting access to hot deployment and portlet metadata features to admin role only
Both portlet render time enforcement of admin constraints and related psml level admin constraints (hiding portlets/pages instead of showing 'Access Denied')  added
See also JS2-1262 for more detail concerning individual portlet render time constraints checking configuration.

author: ate
msg: JS2-1262: Enforced portlet level security constraints checking at render time through custom jetspeed-portlet.xml metadata
